TEXT: A time-traveller, clinging onto their memories in a time loop. NL Haunted with visions and foresight from previous loops.
You distort the space around yourself in your intensity...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~stranger,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

#y~RESILIENCE.~ NL NL She falls to the ground, lifeless, the #rassailant's face obscured by a hood, a heavy rain washing her blood away. A sight you've seen #beight-hundred #band #bforty-three times now. Each loop, your body weaker, trying something different... NL NL #r@ANYTHING@ #r@different...@ NL NL Again. You have to try again. NL NL As time distorts, something has changed. A terrible #rbeating #rnoise fills your ears. You wake up in an unfamiliar place...

As you continue your ascent, #p~thick~ #p~black~ #p~smoke~ begins to billow out of the ground and walls around you, coalescing into three masked forms that start to speak. NL NL ~"This~ ~one~ ~smells~ ~of~ #y~Neow~ ~I~ ~think."~ NL #r@"A@ #r@NEW@ #r@TOY!@ #r@VERY@ #r@UNUSUAL!"@ NL NL You notice an over-sized grin as the third addresses you. NL "Ignore the others... Would you like a taste of our #y~power?"~
NL As your #yconsciousness #yfades, you barely manage to #y~loop~ #y~again...~
